title: Engagement at Beaufort Hall
description: An original e-Novella from beloved New York Times bestselling author Jane Feather, set in the time period made popular by Downton Abbey!When Imogen Carstairs discovers that her fiancé Charles Riverdale has been carrying on an affair with another woman throughout their betrothal, she immediately calls off the engagement, just three days before the wedding. In the wake of social scandal and a broken heart, Gen retreats to her family’s sprawling country estate with her sister, Esther. But Beaufort Hall proves not as distant an escape as she’d hoped, and Gen is compelled to wonder if she can let herself trust Charles again after such a betrayal. Should she follow her head...or her heart?
author: Jane Feather
